```{r setup}
library(rPET)
library(terra)
library(viridis)
rast.gap <- terra::rast(rPET::DATASET.bolasco$gap.fraction )
terra::plot(rast.gap, col=viridis::turbo(n=12), main="GAP Fraction Villa Bolasco" )
```
